name: walletmesh-browser-extension-example
description: Example browser extension wallet using WalletMesh discovery protocol

notes.bundling: This example uses Vite to bundle the extension. The background-simple.ts file is a simplified version that demonstrates the concepts without requiring external dependencies.
notes.development: For development, use 'pnpm dev' to watch for changes and rebuild automatically.
notes.production: For production, use 'pnpm build' to create an optimized bundle.
notes.extension: After building, load the 'dist' directory as an unpacked extension in Chrome.
